seed_summaries.title: Toolformer: Language Models Can Teach Themselves to Use Tools

ideas.title: Self-Training Large Language Models for Tool Use Without Demonstrations
justification_evidence: Proposes self-training for tool use without curated demos
Outlines zero-shot prompting and self-synthesized tool traces
Evaluates on TriviaQA/GSM8K; targets long-tail knowledge
Positions against Toolformer and ToRL supervised approaches

ideas.title: Self-Training Large Language Models for Tool Use Without Demonstrations in Real-World Applications
justification_evidence: Focuses on autonomous tool use via self-training and zero-shot prompts
Targets real-world APIs (weather, finance) with comparable performance claims
Lists experiments for zero-shot prompting and self-training data generation
References Toolformer/GPT4Tools but with limited comparative detail
